div.p: OR YOU CAN COME UP WITH
TO GO UP TO THE SHIP.
THERE ARE NO SIGNS OF ANY
WE GET TO A STARBASE HOSPITAL
WENT ON, OR WHAT'S GOING ON.
OH, I DON'T KNOW ABOUT THAT.
WILL JOIN US AS OUR FRIENDS.

p.span: IT APPEARS ONE OF THE RACE

div.p: ALL THE TIME WE STAY HERE?
I WILL NOT HAVE YOU UPSET
I WANT YOU AND YOUR MEN
I WILL IF I HAVE TO.
THIS IS A FALSE ORDER, ENSIGN.
AND I'LL FOLLOW HIM TO MARCOS 12
AND TO THE ENDS OF THE UNIVERSE!
OF SOME OF YOU ON TRIACUS.
